activities.title: Installation
activities.description: Meter installation for existing or new customers.

activities.title: Replacement
activities.description: Meter replacement for existing customers. Including retrieval of existing meter.

activities.title: Maintenance
activities.description: Meter accessory maintenance e.g. CT, VT, Cables, etc.

activities.title: Recertification
activities.description: Meter recertification for existing customers. Including load and voltage readings.

title: IHS
description: Special project for installation and maintenance of a meter in IHS sites.

title: ATC
description: Special project for installation and maintenance of a meter for ACT sites.

activities.description: Meter installation on PHED distribution transformers.
